ftp.server.command

Class FTPCommandManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ftp.server.command.FTPCommandManager

  • public class FTPCommandManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a command manager. When a command arrives to the request handler, the manager checks if a command in its list accepts that request, and executes it

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FTPCommandManager()
      constructs a FTP command manager

    • Method Summary

      adds a command to the manager

      executes a command
